Experience

Software Engineering Intern

SuperFocus | January 2024 - August 2024

  • Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation AI customer service co-pilot through corpus creation, data cleaning, prompt engineering, and using OpenAI API for generation, to be used by over 150k customer service agents.
  • Spearheaded the integration of a multilingual voice module by implementing speech-to-text and text-to-speech using Deepgram and PlayHT API, enhancing the core functionality of SuperFocus' AI co-pilot platform.
  • Improved the main app engine's performance by reducing voice latency from 5 seconds to 4 seconds (20%) through optimizing and refactoring Python & Rust code, enhancing real-time user interaction across 20+ apps.

Software Engineering Intern

ReNew Power | June 2022 - August 2022

  • Optimized the yaw offset (angle of a wind turbine) using Python and R by analyzing datasets for 21 plants of gross capacity 840 MW, leading to a 17% (143 MW) increase in energy output from ReNew's wind farms.
  • Developed a multiple linear regression model using NumPy and Pandas to predict short/long-term prices of Li-ion batteries, empowering battery storage analysts to make data-driven strategies for battery expansion.

Projects

Data Engineer

InceptEV | August 2024 - December 2024

  • Building validation framework for InceptEV's fleet simulation software, creating data collection methods and Python analysis tools using 15+ real-time vehicle parameters including environment, driver and HVAC data.
  • Led the adaptation of InceptEV's simulation software for Ford Mach-E compatibility, implementing parameters and processing 30+ hours of driving data across diverse weather and route conditions.

Full Stack Mobile Developer

Threadline | January 2025 - Present

  • Developed a wardrobe management app using SwiftUI and Python Django, implementing a graph-based outfit recommendation algorithm that leverages weather data, color theory vectors, and personal style preferences.
  • Led product strategy by prioritizing features, coordinating development sprints, and managing the technical roadmap from initial prototype to feature-complete application.

Data Scientist

Recipe Health Analysis | August 2024 - December 2024

  • Analyzed Food.com's database (83K+ recipes) to investigate whether recipes tagged as 'healthy' have better nutritional profiles.
  • Built and improved machine learning models to predict 'healthy' recipe classification based on nutritional content.
  • Created interactive visualizations to communicate findings about recipe health patterns and user rating relationships.
